2 #include <opencv2/highgui.hpp>
3 #include <pses_control_mpc/ParamsConfig.h>
4 #include <ros/init.h>
5 #include <ros/node_handle.h>
6 #include <ros/publisher.h>
7 #include <ros/rate.h>
8 #include <sensor_msgs/Image.h>
9 #include <std_msgs/Int16.h>
10 
11 #include "MPCController.h"
12 
13 using namespace mpc;
14 
15 int main(int argc, char** argv)
16 {
17  // Init this node
18  ros::init(argc, argv, "control_node");
19  ros::NodeHandle nh;
20 
21  // MPC Controller instance
22  MPCController controller;
23 
24  // Dynamic Reconfiguration
25  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_control_mpc::ParamsConfig> server;
26  dynamic_reconfigure::Server<pses_control_mpc::ParamsConfig>::CallbackType f;
27  f = boost::bind(&MPCController::reconfigureParameters, &controller, _1, _2);
28  server.setCallback(f);
29 
30  // generate subscriber for sensor messages
31  ros::Subscriber imageSub = nh.subscribe<sensor_msgs::Image>(
32  "kinect2/qhd/image_color", 1, boost::bind(&MPCController::processImage, &controller, _1));
33  ros::Subscriber stopSignSub = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Int16>(
34  "/sign_detection_node/StopSign", 1, boost::bind(&MPCController::processStopSign, &controller, _1));
35  ros::Subscriber laneSignSub = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Int16>(
36  "/sign_detection_node/LaneSign", 1, boost::bind(&MPCController::processLaneSign, &controller, _1));
37  ros::Subscriber speedSignSub = nh.subscribe<std_msgs::Int16>(
38  "/sign_detection_node/SpeedSign", 1, boost::bind(&MPCController::processSpeedSign, &controller, _1));
39 
40  // generate control message publisher
41  std_msgs::Int16 motor, steering;
42  ros::Publisher motorCtrl =
43  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int16>("/uc_bridge/set_motor_level_msg", 1);
44  ros::Publisher steeringCtrl =
45  nh.advertise<std_msgs::Int16>("/uc_bridge/set_steering_level_msg", 1);
46 
47  // cv::namedWindow("raw");
48  // cv::namedWindow("transformed");
49  // cv::namedWindow("thresholdedGreen");
50  // cv::namedWindow("thresholdedPink");
51  cv::namedWindow("windowed");
52  cv::namedWindow("windowedOrig");
53  cv::startWindowThread();
54 
55  // Loop
56  int update_rate_hz = 100;
57  double timeSinceApplyingLastInput = 0;
58  ros::Rate loop_rate(update_rate_hz);
59  while (ros::ok())
60  {
61  // Try getting new inputs from the controller
62  if (controller.update(1.0f / update_rate_hz)) {
63  steering.data = controller.getNextSteeringControl();
64  motor.data = controller.getNextMotorControl();
65 
66  steeringCtrl.publish(steering);
67  motorCtrl.publish(motor);
68  }
69 
70  // clear input/output buffers
71  ros::spinOnce();
72  // this is needed to ensure a const. loop rate
73  loop_rate.sleep();
74  }
75 }
